caption.title: SDS-PAGE analysis of the purified Fabs.
caption.p: Purified Fabs 2A6 and 4E2 were preheated and then individually resolved by SDS-PAGE under denaturing and reducing conditions. The heterodimer was dissociated into the light chain (28 kDa) and the Fd fragment (32 kDa). Lane M represents the protein marker.
